name: The Greatest Pizza To Ever Exist

metadata.name: The Greatest Pizza To Ever Exist
metadata.description:
The Greatest Pizza To Ever Exist:

Burn 5 of these NFTs and Redeem by Feb. 21st, 2023 at 10pm Central time To Schedule a Pizza Dinner with the creator of this magnificent spectacle, Hurric4n3Ike  
*Must be in Houston, TX Area for a real life dinner otherwise we will eat on zoom (we may be able to eat together in real life if we'll be in the same city soon though)! I will buy you a pizza either way! !*


Burn 100 of these NFTs and Redeem by Feb. 21st 2023 at 10pm Central time To get flown out to enjoy this pizza with Hurric4n3Ike (or toppings of your choice) at the real life origin location of 'The Greatest Pizza To Ever Exist'. 
*Must fly from somewhere in the United States I will buy your pizza AND plane tickets!*


To Redeem:


*Must Redeem by Feb. 21st 2023 at 10pm Central time at the latest*

Burn your Tokens via the Manifold Burn-Redeem App and receive your 'The Greatest Pizza To Ever Be Burned' NFT(s)

Tweet: ‘I BURNED MY PIZZA @Hurric4n3Ike’ with the photo of this infamous pizza attached on the tweet.


Then DM @Hurric4n3Ike on Twitter with your tweet and your wallet address that holds your redeemed NFTs and schedule the dinner!
